metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28202 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An XSS issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.6, 1.36.x before 1.36.4, and 1.37.x before 1.37.2. The widthheight, widthheightpage, and nbytes properties of messages are not escaped when used in galleries or Special:RevisionDelete.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
